title: Got a black screen/Broken loading screen
body: Whenever I get into a game there's just a black screen, and whenever I load into a game, the screen just doesn't show any champ loading screen arts, ping/ect. I tried repairing the client but it didn't work. Not sure what to do to be honest. Would appreciate any help.

replies.body:
There are a few things that could be causing this, but this is most likely caused by your client not being able to establish a good connection to the servers. Most of the time this is a direct result of local network configurations that conflict with League. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
I'm having this same issue! Are you on a mac?

I've got a same problem but for mine, I updated my Windows 10 to a newer version and the next day I started to play league but after the champion selection, I go to the loading screen as usual but this time, the screen had only the background and the borders for the 10 players but names don't show up, ping, club names, splash art. Then I pressed Tab+ Alt to switch windows, and I come back, for a split second you can see the regular loading screen but after a split second, the screen turns black. The game itself still loads but I just have a black screen. It even manages to join the game but I can't see anything except hear the game sounds.
